--- title: "" sidebar: false toc: false page-layout: full format: html listing: - id: recent-blog-listing contents: - "blog/*/index.qmd" sort: "date desc" type: grid max-items: 9 page-size: 3 categories: false sort-ui: false filter-ui: false fields: [title, image, date, categories] --- ::: {.column-screen} ![](images/banner_imgs/original_banners/horst_openscapes_grassland_big-text.png) ::: ::: {.column-screen} ::: {.white-div} ::: {.blue-underline .center-text} ## **WHAT WE DO** :::
**Openscapes is an open source approach and movement** that helps researchers and those supporting research find each other and feel empowered to conduct data-intensive science. Through a creative approach drawing inspiration and skills from many places, we provide structures for technical skill-building, efficient teamwork, and collaborative community development. Here's how: ::: ::: ::: {.column-screen} ::: {.white-div} ::: {.center-text} ::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4} ::: {.large-body-text .blue-text} {{< fa users title="Three people" >}} ::: ::: {.blue-text .medium-body-text} **ENGAGE** ::: :::{.medium-gray1-text .small-body-text} **We welcome, and create space & place.** We engage researchers who want to work better and collaborate through empathy, art, storytelling, and technology. ::: ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4} ::: {.large-body-text .blue-text} {{< fa lightbulb title="A lightbult" >}} ::: ::: {.blue-text .medium-body-text} **EMPOWER** ::: :::{.medium-gray1-text .small-body-text} **We invest in learning & trust, and work openly.** We empower researchers by growing their confidence and abilities as they put what they learn into practice quickly. ::: ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4} ::: {.large-body-text .blue-text} {{< fa earth-americas title="Planet earth" >}} ::: ::: {.blue-text .medium-body-text} **AMPLIFY** ::: :::{.medium-gray1-text .small-body-text} **We leverage common workflows & tools, and inspire broader shifts.** We amplify progress through collaboration and reuse, celebrating people and small wins that accumulate. ::: :::
::: ::: ::: ::: ::: {.column-screen} ::: {.light-gray-div} ::: {.blue-underline .center-text} ## **GROWING THE OPEN MOVEMENT** :::
**As part of the larger open science movement**, Openscapes helps research teams and organizations reimagine data-intensive science and grow community-centered leadership skills. ::: {.center-text} ::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4 .stat-box} ::: {.large-stat-num .blue-text} **151** ::: :::{.med-sm-body-text} **Research teams** through the Champions Program ::: ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4 .stat-box} ::: {.large-stat-num .blue-text} **80** ::: :::{.med-sm-body-text} **Mentors** onboarded in the Mentors Framework ::: ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4 .stat-box} ::: {.large-stat-num .blue-text} **22** ::: :::{.med-sm-body-text} **Contributors** to the NASA Earthdata Cloud Cookbook ::: ::: ::: :::
::: {.blockquote-speech-bubble} ::: {.speech-bubble-bottom-left} > *"Because of Openscapes, I have renewed hope in how **we can bring about a kinder future in science**. I see a commitment in the open science community to bridging the gaps where we’ve left members of our community behind, and it inspires me."* ::: :::
::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-4 .g-col-md-4} **- Ileana Fenwick,**\ *University of North Carolina*\ *2021 Champion, Mentor, and Program Lead* ::: ::: {.g-col-8 .g-col-md-8}
::: {.speech-bubble-bottom-right} ::: {.blockquote-speech-bubble} > *"Openscapes isn't just about coding and GitHub, it's about **changing how we do science**"* ::: :::
::: {.right-align} **– Malin Pinsky,**\ *University of California, Santa Cruz*\ *2019 Champion* ::: ::: ::: ::: ::: ::: {.column-screen} ::: {.white-div} ::: {.blue-underline .center-text} ## **FROM OUR BLOG** :::
Our blog shares stories from the community and documents our learning openly. See the recent posts below or browse our [full blog listing](blog.qmd).
::: {#recent-blog-listing} ::: ::: :::
